alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:47AM MST until December 30 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow with wind gusts of 40 to 60 mph. Additional new snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of Central and South Central Montana from Judith Gap to Big Timber to Livingston. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on changing road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
